issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
In KS>BaseUI>Views>Table Views>Table View(Layout 2) a valid search for a row does not work.

* this is not a regression, this occurs in 1.8.2 also*

Steps to reproduce:

1: tap on Table Views>Table View(Layout 2)
2: enter a valid search number e.g 5

Actual result: no search occurs.
Expected result: only the rows that contain the search string should be in the view.
fields.summary: Android:KS Table Views- Search does not bring in any result

comments.body:
The problem can reproduce with release 3.0.2 and latest master version 3.1.0

Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build:  2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 (27/02/2013)
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 (27/02/2013)
Device: Samsung galaxy s duos Android version: 4.0.4
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
